text:
CHANNEL
STUDIOS—UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON
TRANSMITTER—EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
KCTS-TV
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
September 11, 1961
Bill Harley
NAEB
Washington, D. C.
Dear Bill:
I receibed the enclosed invitation to attend the
American Council on Education meeting in Washington
in October, as a delegate of NAEB.
This is not something I want to, or aan afford the
time to attend, but if it is desirable that NAEB
be represented, someone else can better do it than me.
The inviation asks for reply in any event. Will you
return it, filling in your own name, or anyone else
who could or should take my proxy.
University of Washington Seattle Public Schools * King County Schools Seattle University Seattle Pacific College Seattle Public Library
